articles.title: 13 Things From Faherty You'll Want To Wear Every Day
articles.author: Rachel Dunkel
articles.summary: The content introduces a new clothing line featuring various items. These include a $168 terry quarter-zip, a $168 cotton gauze jumpsuit, and $178 patch pocket pants.  A $168 linen shorts and button-up set is also available, with the top priced at $168 and the shorts at $110.

articles.title: Home Bargains £3.99 conditioner that over 55s say has made hair ‘grow tremendously'
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Mizani Coconut Hairdress Conditioner 226g, a product from Mizani, is now available at Home Bargains for £3.99, significantly reduced from its previous price of £14.99. Mizani describes the product, containing rosemary, chamomile, and natural oils, as ideal for curly to tightly-coiled hair. Home Bargains also stocks other Mizani and Aussie hair products, including the Aussie 3 Minute Miracle Moisture Deep Treatment.

articles.title: Prime Day Robot Vacuum Deals: Save Up to $900 on Some of Our Favorite Smart ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Roomba, Roborock, and Eufy are offering significant Prime Day deals on robot vacuums. Customers can save on these top brands during the promotional period, making it an opportune time to purchase these floor-cleaning devices.

articles.title: TikTok building new version of app ahead of expected U.S. sale, The Information reports
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: TikTok is developing a new version of its app tailored for users in the United states.

articles.title: China's BYD launches hybrid EV with 1,243-mile range, LFP battery
articles.author: Bojan Stojkovski
articles.summary: BYD has launched its new plug-in hybrid station wagon, the Seal 06 DM-i, in China with a starting price of $15,230. The vehicle features a mixed driving range of 1,243 miles and offers two powertrain options with varying horsepower and battery sizes, along with driver assistance system DiPilot 100.

articles.title: 35 Mundane But Useful Items You'll Be Glad You Bought
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article introduces various new products and services for cleaning, personal care, and travel. These include a Finish dishwasher cleaner, Bounce wrinkle release spray, Scrub Daddy Damp Duster alternative sponges, a Frida Baby rinse cup, limited edition wildflower Band-Aids, and a next-level toothbrush. It also presents Neutrogena makeup remover towelettes, Miss Mouth's Messy Eater Stain Treater Spray, LeakLocks Toiletry Skins, and Gillette on-the-go razor, among others, all designed to improve convenience and solve everyday problems.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 is just ahead. What to know before the sales begin
articles.author: Jalen Williams
articles.summary: Amazon is expanding Prime Day 2025 to a four-day event from July 8-11, offering exclusive deals to Prime members. Early deals include discounts up to 40% on kitchenware, home improvement tools, garden supplies, electronics, Amazon Basics (up to 30% off), and Amazon Essentials (up to 30% off).  There are also deals with Grubhub+ ($10 off orders over $20 with code PRIME10), Avis (up to 30% off), Carnival Cruises, and hotel deals via Visit Myrtle Beach.

articles.title: What makes Turbologo so addictive? A deep dive
articles.author: Focus Contributor
articles.summary: Turbologo has launched a platform that delivers immediate logo design results, allowing users to input their business name and preferences to receive dozens of branded logo concepts. The platform provides a complete download package, including high-resolution files, social media-ready sizes, and color palettes, transforming Turbologo from a design tool into a business acceleration tool.

articles.title: Our Favorite Amazon Prime Day Deals on Running Sneakers
articles.author: Samantha Jones
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Prime Day next week, offering deals on running shoes from brands including Adidas, New Balance, Saucony, and Asics. Shoppers can already find discounts up to half off on top running shoe brands. Early savings are currently available on Brooks and New Balance shoes.

articles.title: How to Watch Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Live
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing for its Galaxy Unpacked event in New York City on July 9, 2025, where it's expected to launch new products. Anticipated announcements include three foldable phones, three Galaxy watches, and the launch of One UI 8 and One UI 8 watch updates.

articles.title: Superman & Super DM-i
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
org: SM Mall of Asia Music Hall
articles.summary: BYD Cars Philippines has launched the BYD Sealion 5 DM-i, a subcompact SUV, with a starting price of P1.248 million. The Sealion 5 DM-i features DM-i technology, a combined output of 197ps and 300Nm of torque, and a total driving range of over 1,000km.

articles.title: Easily remove pet hair with this cheap and simple hack
articles.author: Morgan Devries
articles.summary: Nick Jordan, the founder of Your Service Animal, promotes a tennis ball laundry method as an inexpensive and effective solution for removing pet hair from clothing. This method aims to help pet owners maintain a professional appearance by tackling deeply embedded pet hair, offering a cost-effective alternative to specialized pet hair removal tools.

articles.title: 4 Must-Have Lip Essentials on Myntras Payday Sale
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra is offering new lip products from Lakme, Inatur, and Renee. Lakme introduces a cushion matte lipstick, Inatur offers a two-shade lip gloss set, Lakme has a Perfect Definition Pencil Lipliner and Renee presents a set of 12 matte pencil lip liners, each with unique features and shades designed to enhance and define lips.

articles.title: Olay 'anti-wrinkle' moisturiser that's 'better than high end brands' now 63% off
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Olay's Regenerist Whip Moisturiser, an anti-wrinkle cream, is available at a 63% discount on Amazon. The cream contains Niacinamide and anti-ageing peptides, offering a lightweight texture, hydrating results, and SPF 30.

articles.title: Band Inspiring Millions on Spotify
articles.summary: The Velvet Sundown, a band potentially generated by AI, has gained traction on Spotify amassing many listeners. This has caused Spotify and other platforms to think about labeling AI generated music, as only Deezer currently identifies AI-generated content.

articles.title: The €39.99 Lidl Ireland buy that will banish germs and keep home spick and span – it's ready for use in only 30 seconds
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: LIDL Ireland is launching the Silvercrest 1500W Steam Mop & Handheld Steam for €39.99, available from July 14th to August 31st. Aldi Ireland is set to launch a BBQ Gas Pizza Oven, featuring a powder-coated steel exterior and capable of reaching over 900 degrees.

articles.title: Don't wait for Amazon Prime Day, our experts found 67 deals worth shopping early
articles.author: Rikka Altland
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day is approaching, and retailers like Bissell, Dyson, Shark, Apple, Sony, Anker, LG, and Samsung are offering discounts on various products. New items such as the Bissell Little Green Mini Carpet Cleaner, Shark FlexBreeze Pro Mist Fan, Apple AirPods Pro (Gen 2) With USB-C, LG 55-Inch C4 Evo 4K OLED Smart TV are among discounted new or recently launched products. The sale includes deals on electronics, home appliances, and other essentials.

articles.title: All the Aldi Specialbuys hitting shelves this weekend including £2.49 holiday essential
articles.author: Senior Consumer Reporter
articles.summary: ALDI is launching a range of summer essentials and beach accessories as part of its Specialbuys. The product line includes children's hats, swimwear, beach towels, robes, beach tents, and a sand-free blanket, as well as Dryrobe dupes, with prices ranging from £1.99 to £39.99.

articles.title: Next's £30 linen summer dress is 'very comfortable to wear in hot weather'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next offers the Kaftan Mini Dress with Linen (£30-£42) and Forever Comfort Double Strap Footbed Sandals (£29). White Stuff retails the June Short Sleeve Linen Dress (£55-£79), while H&M features the Viscose Tunic Dress (£9-£19.99).

articles.title: SEOJuice Launches to Help Websites Automate 95% of SEO
articles.summary: SEOJuice has launched an AI-powered SEO automation platform designed to automate 95% of SEO tasks for businesses, solo entrepreneurs, and content creators. It automates internal linking, on-page optimizations, and accessibility enhancements. The platform's methodology is research-backed, analyzing over 10 million pages and uses a simple JavaScript snippet for integration.

articles.title: We found 6 Dyson vacuums on sale before Amazon Prime Day even starts - save up to 26% off right now on top-rated models including the V8 Plus
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Dyson is offering discounted prices on various vacuum models including cordless sticks, robot vacuums, upright vacuums, and canister vacuums. The Dyson 360 Vis Nav Robot Vacuum, launched in early 2024, features strong suction power, 360-degree vision, 26 sensors, and MyDyson app compatibility.

articles.title: New Dyson Launch: Truly Insane Tech Revealed!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Dyson has launched its new Airwrap, an enhanced version of its original hair styling tool that uses the Coanda effect. The new Airwrap features improved attachments, better temperature control, and aims to minimize heat damage. Dyson's Airwrap signals a shift towards personalized and intelligent styling, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the home styling market.

articles.title: What time does Amazon Prime Day 2025 start? Here's your last-minute guide
articles.author: Jalen Williams
articles.summary: Amazon is expanding Amazon Prime Day to four days, from July 8-11, offering exclusive deals to Prime members. A new 'Prime for Young Adults' membership is being introduced for 18- to 24-year-olds, which includes a six-month free trial and costs $7.49 per month after that. Also, customers who qualify for government assistance can receive a 50% discount, making the service just $6.99 a month.

articles.title: Aldi's ‘divine' £3.49 summer buy is flying off middle aisle & smells ‘identical' to cult brand worth £23
articles.author: Amelia Morgan
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a trio of new Lacura lip balms priced at £3.49 each, offering a cheaper alternative to the Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balms. They are available in Cake Pop, Dulce De Leche, and Vanilla flavors. Last month, Aldi also launched two new Lacura Watermelon Serums for £4.99 as dupes for Glow Recipe's products.

articles.title: Aldi's ‘divine' £3.49 summer buy is flying off middle aisle & smells ‘identical' to cult brand worth £23
articles.author: Amelia Morgan
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a new line of Lacura lip balms, available in Cake Pop, Dulce De Leche, and Vanilla flavors, priced at £3.49 each. These lip balms are presented as an affordable alternative to Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balms.

articles.title: 48 Products To Try This Summer That Actually Work
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products and updates for the summer. One/Size introduced On 'Til Dawn waterproof setting spray, and Cosrx released a SPF 50+ sunscreen.  Owala is launching Freesip, an insulated bottle with a built-in straw and wide-mouth spout, while Black & Decker offers a portable air conditioner. These products address common summer needs such as makeup setting, sun protection, hydration, and cooling.

articles.title: AI translation face-off: I tested iPhone vs Samsung Galaxy vs Google Pixel and here's the winner
articles.author: Tom Pritchard
articles.summary: The article compares translation features on the Google Pixel 9 Pro, Samsung Galaxy S25, and iPhone 15 Pro Max. It assesses text, camera, and audio translation capabilities across Google Translate, Galaxy AI, and Apple Intelligence, highlighting the strengths and weaknesses of each platform. The review covers translation performance in French, Spanish, and Mandarin, evaluating accuracy and usability.

articles.title: Early Prime Day deal knocks 65% off 'lightweight and powerful' Remington hair dryer
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Remington has discounted its Hair Dryer Ionic D3198 to £19.99 from £56.99 on Amazon as an early Prime Day deal. This hair dryer is designed for salon-quality results, featuring ionic technology to reduce drying time and enhance hair texture; alternatives such as Dyson Supersonic r hair dryer for £449.99, Shark SpeedStyle Pro FLEX 4-in-1 High Velocity Hair Dryer System for £199.99 and Alivio Lightweight Hair Dryer for £19.99 are available in the market.

articles.title: Myntra launches Glamstream: A shoppable video platform inside its app- Explained
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Myntra has launched Glamstream, a new content-commerce feature. Glamstream provides users a video-led shopping experience directly from the Myntra app. The service includes over 500 hours of shoppable content across various categories.

articles.title: Digital Bank's Argentina Launch: Double 100 Strategy Explained
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Revolut plans to launch a complete banking service in Argentina, encompassing savings, investments, payments, and credit from day one. This comprehensive approach aims to attract customers underserved by existing institutions in a competitive market, where Revolut seeks to differentiate itself and become the primary financial hub for users.

articles.title: Glass cold — Beyond 5 Beverages redefines the taste of Jamaican coffee
articles.summary: Beyond 5 Beverages launched in March 2024 with a line of premium cold coffee beverages made from 100% Jamaica Blue Mountain Coffee. The company plans to launch new product lines including dairy-free and alcohol-infused iced coffee, as well as frozen coffee novelties like ice cream to broaden appeal and drive growth.

articles.title: Limpopo sweet potato yoghurt sparks international interest
articles.author: Rendani Raliphaswa
articles.summary: Entrepreneur Edward Kgarose launched a factory in 2016 to produce a unique sweet potato-flavored drinking yogurt. Kgarose aims to expand the business nationally and internationally, with plans to produce over 14,000 ml daily to meet demands from countries like Nigeria, Uganda, and Canada.

articles.title: Starlink Mini: Satellite Internet on iPhone – Setup Guide
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: SpaceX launched Starlink Mini, a compact and portable satellite internet device. This system offers high-speed internet access via a compact antenna, integrated Wi-Fi, and a user-friendly setup, designed for quick installation. The Starlink Mini unlocks possibilities for remote work, education, and entertainment, benefiting from portable and reliable internet access.

articles.title: 31 Travel Items That Are Your Packing Fairy Godmothers
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Solgaard launched the Carry-On Closet, a suitcase featuring a six-tier pop-out shelving system designed to compress and organize clothes, eliminating the need to unpack during travel. The product aims to save users money by avoiding checked baggage fees.

articles.title: Former ‘Scandal!' Actress Lerato Nxumalo Launches New Clothing Business
articles.author: Moroba Moroeng
articles.summary: Lerato Nxumalo is launching her new clothing business, blaHoody, which specializes in oversized plush hoodies designed for comfort and warmth. The launch is scheduled for "next week," and fans have expressed strong support for the new venture.

articles.title: The big leap: Why Dyson employees are encouraged to ‘have the wrong thinking'
articles.author: Jessica Yun
org: Dyson Institute of Engineering and Technology
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new haircare range called Chitosan, featuring five products: four pre-style creams for different hair types and a post-styling serum. The products are priced at $89 per 100ml bottle and aim to provide skincare-like benefits for hair health, offering a more accessible entry point to the Dyson brand compared to products like the Dyson Airwrap.

articles.title: The big leap: Why Dyson employees are encouraged to ‘have the wrong thinking'
articles.author: Jessica Yun
org: Dyson Institute of Engineering and Technology
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new premium haircare range called Chitosan, which includes five products: pre-style creams for different hair types and a post-styling serum. The products are positioned as an accessible entry point to the Dyson brand, with the serum bottle featuring a magnetic cap and pump to dispense the product.

articles.title: The big leap: Why Dyson employees are encouraged to ‘have the wrong thinking'
articles.author: Jessica Yun
articles.summary: Dyson is launching a new line of haircare products, including hair cream and serum, with a focus on Chitosan technology. The new product range, based on a molecule derived from oyster mushrooms, is designed to hold curls longer without stiffness. Dyson's development of these products demonstrates a long-term commitment to innovation in the beauty industry.

articles.title: The big leap: Why Dyson employees are encouraged to ‘have the wrong thinking'
articles.author: Jessica Yun
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new line of haircare products, including hair cream and serum, featuring Chitosan technology. This technology, derived from oyster mushrooms, claims to hold curls twice as long without the unwanted crunch from styling products. Justina Mejia-Montane, Dyson's global head of formulations, was hired to lead this new venture.

articles.title: 35 Products You'll Wish You Found Sooner
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: LilyAna Naturals introduced a retinol cream designed to reduce fine lines and wrinkles using retinol, hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, shea butter, jojoba oil, and green tea. Cosrx launched a repairing essence to hydrate, rejuvenate, and repair skin suitable for all skin types. Batiste launched a dry shampoo foam for quick hair revival without residue.

articles.title: 27 Affordable Lulus Dresses For All Your Plans
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: Lulus offers a variety of new dresses, including maxi, mini, bodycon, and evening dress styles. These dresses are available in various sizes and colors, with prices ranging from $39 to $99. The collection features different designs such as backless lace, floral, and retro styles, catering to various occasions like bridal showers, beach outings, and weddings.

articles.title: Next's 'elegant' £39 black dress that can be worn everywhere shopper 'highly recommends'
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Next is offering the "Friends Like These Black V-Neck ITY Flutter Sleeve Midi Dress" for £39. The dress, made from soft jersey fabric with flutter sleeves and a v-neckline, is available in sizes 8 to 24 and multiple colors. Customer reviews highlight its great fit, quality fabric, and comfort.

articles.title: My washing machine is super clean and smells good thanks to 1 item
articles.author: Chanelle Georgina
articles.summary: Dettol 5 in 1 Antibacterial Washing Machine Cleaner claims to kill bacteria, prevent bad odours, remove limescale and hidden dirt, leading to lasting freshness. The product is used by adding the entire bottle into the washing machine drawer and running a 60C wash without clothes. Results show clothes coming out of the wash smelling lovely, even without scent boosters, making it a worthwhile investment every two months.

articles.title: How to make tuna mayo tastier with 1 simple ingredient 5 chefs love
articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.summary: Five chefs suggest using Albacore tuna in olive oil for better tuna mayo. Albacore tuna has lighter colored flesh and a milder flavor than other tuna. The author tries a tuna mayo recipe using Albacore tuna and shares the ingredients and method for preparation.

articles.title: 40 Products That'll Make You Pat Yourself On The Back Every Time You Use Them
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream containing salicylic acid, glycerin, and aloe. Sol De Janeiro launched Bum Bum Cream that smells like caramel and pistachio. Veet launched sensitive hair removal gel formulated with aloe. Cosrx launched repairing essence with 96% snail secretion filtrate.

articles.title: Stephen Curry's wife Ayesha Curry gives exclusive glimpse of upcoming Sweet July Skin launch
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.summary: Ayesha Curry, the founder of Sweet July Skin, hinted at a new product launch on Instagram, tagging the brand @sweetjulyskin and using fruit emojis. The skincare line, known for its clean, plant-based products, is expected to introduce a fruit-based skincare product or a new skincare set. Fans are speculating about the launch of a new product.

articles.title: Enjoying 'Mario Kart World'? LEGO Races to the Finish Line With Their Latest 'Super Mario' Sets
articles.author: Collider
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 a month ago. The system also has a debut title available.

articles.title: China's BYD launches hybrid EV with 1,243-mile range, lithium ferrophosphate battery
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: BYD launched the Seal 06 DM-i, a new plug-in hybrid station wagon, in China. The vehicle features a mixed driving range of 1,243 miles and fuel consumption of 74.7 mpg. The Seal 06 DM-i is priced starting at $15,230.
